title: Post the moment that you realized it was going to be One Of Those Gamesâ„¢

replies.body: when adc locked in vayne

{{champion:92}} Top 
{{champion:11}} Jungle
{{champion:157}} Mid
{{champion:67}} ADC

I don't want to live in this world anymore.

I miss a Morg Q.
{{champion:202}} "0/1"
missed another
{{champion:202}}  "0/2"
land my next one, says nothing. 
Missed another "0/3"

One of the few times i have actually had to mute somebody pre 10 minutes.
0/ FOUR
I would actually just start roaming and let him go fuck himself.
Maybe he was hyping up to the fourth.
When I signed up for an account

Loading screen:

Bronze season 5 icon.
No border at all.
Soulstealer Vayne
Vayne Mastery 7.

I'm the support.

Mother of God.

If fear was a CC in real life there's the source.

Enemy {{champion:134}} in gold
Friendly {{champion:157}} in bronze 

As soon as minions reach lane: {{champion:157}}  First blood!

{{champion:157}} *all chat* GG

{{champion:133}} : Says something in Spanish and gets first blood on {{champion:2}} 
{{champion:133}} :Proceeds to die 5 times to said {{champion:2}}

When the JG claims he'll never gank for me because I didn't help leash.

{{champion:9}} : Come help leash, Yorick.

{{champion:83}} : Umm... we're on the Red side of the map, and you're starting Blue...

{{champion:9}} : Fine, never ganking you.

https://i.imgflip.com/qiev6.jpg

****

When a player is clamouring about being auto-filled and I offer to trade roles...

Player 1: OMG Auto-fill sucks, Riot is dumb,  Blah-Blah Autofill complaints, etc...

Me: Want Top? I'll trade if you want.

Player 1: **ck off.

http://i0.kym-cdn.com/entries/icons/original/000/000/554/facepalm.jpg

****

Or when I DO trade roles with someone else, and then they go to the area their ORIGINAL role was meant to:

{{champion:44}} (Me): Wait, I gave you Mid because you said you didn't want Support! 

{{champion:112}} (Other player) : Meh, changed my mind.

https://media.giphy.com/media/FvcQgJnnjvo8o/giphy.gif

{{champion:98}} Melledoneus: Alright guys, when I ult you, go back in so we can turn the fight around.
{{champion:222}} MyTeammate: Ok. But you can't ult me, there's no friendly fire.
{{champion:89}} HerDuo: Idiot. Don't worry, Shen. I gotcha covered. I'll save a ward so you can TP down here.
{{champion:98}} Melledoneus: Ergh...
{{champion:136}} My mid laner: Guys what do I max, E or Q? First time
{{champion:98}} Melledoneus: This is gonna be a long game...
{{champion:23}} MyJungler: No kidding. Haven't played AP Tryndamere since Season 3. What the hell are these new items?

I realized it was going to be one of those games when the guy who post this - http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance/fj8EF3YP-if-im-autofilled-support-i-can-play-whatever-i-want -  got autofilled as my support.

{{champion:266}} How does this champ work??? 

-patch 7.5 in ranked

{{champion:113}} **Just finished getting Gromp from leash, now getting Blue**

{{champion:127}} Dude, wtf gank me!

No joke, this fucking happened, I just hit lv 2 and this player who sucked so hard demanded I gank them when I haven't even done my third camp.

Get red , krugs, raptors , gank bot and get dubble kill. 0-2 riven top: gg wp report jugnler no ganks. a summoner has disconnected.
most extreem case of blame the jugnler i ever had.

Me: ganking top level 3. Play safe and let him push.

Top lane: K

Right after I finish second camp "an ally has been slain!"

Top lane: ff20 trash jungler doesn't gank

Ally locks in {{champion:11}} jungle

Well there goes
My ganks
Our early game
My lane farm
My chat cos i gotta mute it

Yi jungle is so annoying he does literally nothing but be a nuisance with 0 pressure but stealing your farm once in a while leaving your lane in a tough spot while putting you behind every time he shows up . . .

There is ofc that 1 yi in a 100 that is actually good with the champ and carries lucky for me i had one of those in my last game

In Champ Select:
{{champion:104}} : [Is Top] "I go JG and carry okay? Ok"
{{champion:164}} *Bans {{champion:104}} *
{{champion:104}} : Lol
{{champion:104}} : *autolocks {{champion:20}} {{summoner:11}} *

This actually happened to me yesterday.

See also:
*6 min into game*
Our {{champion:84}}  vs Enemy {{champion:1}} mid.
Our {{champion:32}} pings he's on his way for gank.
{{champion:84}} : *Goes in too early for gank, dies before {{champion:32}}  even reaches river bush.*
{{champion:84}} : MUMU WTF? NO HELP? TRASH JG. NOW IM TILTED AND IM GONNA FEED
{{champion:84}} : idc if we lose as long as amumu loses. trash amumu. @#&! amumu, 
I just want a normal ranked game where if we lose it isn't because someone afk's or trolls or tilts or throws.. Is that so hard :(
when my janna is 0-5 in lane, how do you die on janna someone explain =[

{{champion:238}} "Zed is easy I can first time him in ranked, I main Vayne!"

*Looks at his op.gg* *Has a 34% winrate on Vayne after 400+ games*

1/7{{champion:42}} 
An ally has been slain.
1/8{{champion:42}}: jdhwicbgb t ysgagcifi
An ally has disconnected
5 minutes later...
An ally has reconnected
{{champion:42}} : sorry, i punched my keyboard and broke my laptop. Had to get on my desktop.
An ally has been slain
An ally has disconnected
Bronze ranked is a beautiful thing

Just now actually.

Gets in lobby.

**SUPPORT:** "Fuck Auto fill, can any one trade?"

**TOP:** "No"

**MID:** "Cant"

**JUNGLE:** "sorry dude"

**BOT(Me):** "I can"

**SUPPORT:** "No I'll supp, I'm trash at ADC"

**BOT(Me):** "..."

http://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/NA1/2445920659/41472353?tab=overview

Proceeded to whine about auto fill the whole time.

Top lane

pre minions
 
*An ally has been slain*

*An ally has been slain*

*A summoner has disconnected*

{{champion:13}} -"QAFIGAFGaifsakijgfbsduvbacvnbcvyt"
{{champion:34}} -"ryze are you ok"
{{champion:13}} -" stfu I have iq 200"
That's amazing and rather horrifying.

I've been in matches with a lot of interesting people. Once a Tristana blamed me for not shielding her because "my fingers aren't fast enough" because it couldn't possibly have been on cd. this was after deciding to 1v2 while our turret was pushed in, btw.

Off-topic, one of my favorite moments was going into blind pick with a 5-man and everyone took smite. Then the loading screen came up and all of the other team had smite, too!

{{champion:432}}  WHY DIDNT YOU GO WITH ME WHEN I WENT IN?!

{{champion:202}}  well a 2v4 under their turret didnt sound like my idea of a party
{{champion:202}} and you couldnt dodge a skill shot if the thresh missed on purpose

"Hey last pick, we need something ap, please"
"Dw, I got this bad boy..."
**locks in {{champion:157}} **
*Proceeds to curb stomp the enemy team with full-AP Yasuo*
Sigh, if only..

Toplaner is half HP.
Jungler is nearly full HP.
Enemy toplaner is nearly dead.
Jungler ganks top.
Enemy toplaner gets doublekill.
They start blaming each other.
Rest of allies embrace the arrival of inevitable loss.
When my jungle kindred died for the fourth time in 8 minutes after invading a fourth time despite being massively behind from her other 3 deaths

{{champion:64}} E to a ward. Flash Q to entire enemy team.

_An ally has been slain._


{{champion:64}} Wtf where's my team???
Our top laner first picked Riven.

{{champion:157}} : 0/10

{{champion:61}} : 5/3 (Accidently doesnt land E on yas when he 1/5s)

{{champion:157}} : OMG DUDE WTF U DIDNT E ME UR SO SHIT

**Team Comp:** {{champion:25}} {{champion:202}} {{champion:58}} {{champion:104}} 
**Mid Laner:** This would be a perfect time to lock {{champion:157}} .

Oh! I know I put one earlier but I remembered one from a long time ago.


Actual Jungler: all right, we all set?

{{champion:266}} : Woah, woah, I deserve to be jungle.

Literally everyone else on the team: but the actual jungler called the role first. You can't just usurp it like that.

{{champion:266}} But I've been playing longer! And I'm the best Aatrox player! I deserve it!


{{champion:266}} proceeds to take all our jungler's camps, leave our bot lane to have to go 1v2, and goes 1/15.

Top: WHY DONT YOU GANK TOP LANE

me: Why dont you spend 75 gold on a ward so you stop getting ganked every 5 seconds

TOP: I CAN ONLY BUY ONE AND IT GETS DELETED

me: You can hold 3... for 225 gold you can generally stop the enemy from getting 300 gold, AND you can keep my ganking lines clear of wards for easier ganks

TOP: thanks man im 0-5 because of you

me: no youre 0-5 because of you

Me (support TK): Hah, that was a bad engage. Sorry. It's my second game on Tahm Kench. My friend tricked me into playing ranked last time, and that was so embarrassing. Have to get some normals in to learn the champ first, right?
My ADC: this is ranked
{{champion:35}} : Irelia, have fun not getting ganks top because you didn't leash for me.

Jungle picks teemo.
Support picks teemo. 
Anyone picks Teemo.....
I know past 15 minutes its gogni to become a 4v5 cause teemo's just gna sit somewhere like an idiot going " hehe xD Im a mobile ward. "
Excuse my M7 teemo carrying silver teams.
A free item counters your whole kit thats why *silver* is the key word. Not hating on you, just teemo himself.

{{champion:89}} : outplays lvl 3 gank by double buff graves, gives her adc  2/0/1 lead in a 2v3 (that's me)
{{champion:222}} : perma-shoves giving enemy freeze right outside their tower so I cannot get further engages and opening us up to the camping graves jungle and the taliyah mid who hits 6 and ults bot for a double thanks to good flash engage by her support naut
{{champion:89}} : jinx, let them push out/just last hit so we can engage on them and kill them; I can't tower dive this early into game
{{champion:222}} : ignores her support who did all the work to give her the lead... blows lead into a 2/6/1, continues to feed
{{champion:89}} : leaves troll adc to roam and help more intelligent teammates
{{champion:99}} : don't be so toxic to {{champion:222}}  this isn't diamond (upon me expressing frustration at jinx for never letting enemy push out so we can engage and kill them and giving enemy team easiest 4v2 ganks of their lives REPEATEDLY despite my requests and communication about why forcing enemy to farm away from tower helps us)
{{champion:89}} : (to lux) so you are saying we can't possibly make a smart decision just because we are not diamond rank or higher?...

Cuz low rank players always assume supports know nothing. Doesn't matter if they call all enemy rotations and teammates could survive 3 or 4 man ganks if they listened right away. Doesn't matter if they main top, mid, jungle, or adc and regularly outperform everyone on their team. Doesn't matter if their shotcall is obviously the best possible decision; their team is always like "*&#$ you, we are going to do this dumb move instead just because you are the support and made a good call". Since when can you not make a simple yet good decision simply because you are lower ranked? It's like saying you can't shout fire or pull the alarm to warn other people to get out because you are in a library. Um hello? If you know something is a good play, don't choose an obviously inferior or stupid play just because you are not in a high enough elo to possibly have the brains to make such a good play.
{{champion:67}} "Silver of the moon"

This turned out as a win. But its cause we beat them in team fights 

{{champion:21}} - first back buys a tear-
{{champion:16}} (me): the fuck is that on mf?
{{champion:21}} : I knew someone would say something, Just trust.
{{champion:16}} (me): k man, you got this. lets go.

{{champion:21}} - 0/9/2 at 30 minutes

{{champion:114}} : why the fuck did I add you, that's my duo

{{champion:16}} -end game at 66 minutes- -85,000 healing done to team- 1/9/29

we came back and won after late game and being back and forth between bases on team fights. {{champion:21}} ended up 13/14/7 when she finally positioned better with her ult.

*in champ select* 
random player: "hmm" *locks teemo*
